sections.Benefit: When you use a tower shield, the shield's armor check penalty only applies to Strength and Dexterity-based skills.
sections.Special: Fighters automatically have Tower Shield Proficiency as a bonus feat. They need not select it.
sections.Normal: A character using a shield with which he is not proficient takes the shield's armor check penalty on attack rolls and on all skill checks that involve moving, including Ride.
